arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدْ اٰتَيْنَآ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ رُشْدَهٗ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا بِهٖ عٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad aatainaaa Ibraaheema rushdahoo min qablu wa kunnaa bihee 'aalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa laqad ātainā ibrāhīma rusydahū min qablu wa kunnā bihī ‘ālimīn(a).
translation_en: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah menganugerahkan kepada Ibrahim petunjuk sebelum (Musa dan Harun) dan Kami telah mengetahui dirinya.

arabic: اِذْ قَالَ لِاَبِيْهِ وَقَوْمِهٖ مَا هٰذِهِ التَّمَاثِيْلُ الَّتِيْٓ اَنْتُمْ لَهَا عٰكِفُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahee 'aakifoon
transliteration_id: Iż qāla li'abīhi wa qaumihī mā hāżihit-tamāṡīlul-latī antum lahā ‘ākifūn(a).
translation_en: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika dia (Ibrahim) berkata kepada bapaknya dan kaumnya, “Patung-patung apakah ini yang kamu tekun menyembahnya?”

arabic: قَالُوْا وَجَدْنَآ اٰبَاۤءَنَا لَهَا عٰبِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa lahaa 'aabideen
transliteration_id: Qālū wajadnā ābā'anā lahā ‘ābidīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
translation_id: Mereka menjawab, “Kami mendapati nenek moyang kami menjadi para penyembahnya”

arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ كُنْتُمْ اَنْتُمْ وَاٰبَاۤؤُكُمْ فِيْ ضَلٰلٍ مُّبِيْنٍ
transliteration_en: Qaala laqad kuntum antum wa aabaaa'ukum fee dalaalim mubeen
transliteration_id: Qāla laqad kuntum antum wa ābā'ukum fī ḍalālim mubīn(in).
translation_en: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Sungguh, kamu dan nenek moyang kamu berada dalam kesesatan yang nyata.”

arabic: قَالُوْٓا اَجِئْتَنَا بِالْحَقِّ اَمْ اَنْتَ مِنَ اللّٰعِبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen
transliteration_id: Qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqqi am anta minal-lā‘ibīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Apakah engkau datang kepada kami membawa kebenaran atau engkau (hanya) bermain-main?”

arabic: قَالَ بَلْ رَّبُّكُمْ رَبُّ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ الَّذِيْ فَطَرَهُنَّۖ وَاَنَا۠ عَلٰى ذٰلِكُمْ مِّنَ الشّٰهِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal ardil lazee fatarahunna wa ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen
transliteration_id: Qāla bar rabbukum rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍil-lażī faṭarahunn(a), wa ana ‘alā żālikum minasy-syāhidīn(a).
translation_en: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) menjawab, “Sebenarnya, Tuhan kamu adalah Tuhan langit dan bumi yang telah menciptakannya dan aku adalah salah satu saksi atas itu.”

arabic: وَتَاللّٰهِ لَاَكِيْدَنَّ اَصْنَامَكُمْ بَعْدَ اَنْ تُوَلُّوْا مُدْبِرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa tallaahi la akeedanna asnaamakum ba'da an tuwalloo mudbireen
transliteration_id: Wa tallāhi la'akīdanna aṣnāmakum ba‘da an tuwallū mudbirīn(a).
translation_en: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
translation_id: (Nabi Ibrahim berkata dalam hatinya,) “Demi Allah, sungguh, aku akan melakukan tipu daya terhadap berhala-berhalamu setelah kamu pergi meninggalkannya.”

arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ جُذٰذًا اِلَّا كَبِيْرًا لَّهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ اِلَيْهِ يَرْجِعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Faja'alahum juzaazan illaa kabeeral lahum la'allahum ilaihi yarji'oon
transliteration_id: Fa ja‘alahum jużāżan illā kabīral lahum la‘allahum ilaihi yarji‘ūn(a).
translation_en: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) lalu menjadikan mereka (berhala-berhala itu) hancur berkeping-keping, kecuali (satu patung) yang terbesar milik mereka agar mereka kembali (untuk bertanya) kepadanya.

arabic: قَالُوْا مَنْ فَعَلَ هٰذَا بِاٰلِهَتِنَآ اِنَّهٗ لَمِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Qālū man fa‘ala hāżā bi'ālihatinā innahū laminaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Siapakah yang melakukan (perbuatan) ini terhadap tuhan-tuhan kami? Sesungguhnya dia termasuk orang-orang zalim.”

arabic: قَالُوْا سَمِعْنَا فَتًى يَّذْكُرُهُمْ يُقَالُ لَهٗٓ اِبْرٰهِيْمُ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo sami'naa fatany yazkuruhum yuqaalu lahooo Ibraaheem
transliteration_id: Qālū sami‘nā fatay yażkuruhum yuqālu lahū ibrāhīm(u).
translation_en: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
translation_id: Mereka (para penyembah berhala yang lain) berkata, “Kami mendengar seorang pemuda yang mencela mereka (berhala-berhala). Dia dipanggil dengan nama Ibrahim.”

arabic: قَالُوْا فَأْتُوْا بِهٖ عَلٰٓى اَعْيُنِ النَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَشْهَدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo faatoo bihee 'alaaa a'yunin naasi la'allahum yash hadoon
transliteration_id: Qālū fa'tū bihī ‘alā a‘yunin-nāsi la‘allahum yasyhadūn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “(Kalau demikian,) bawalah dia dengan diperlihatkan kepada orang banyak agar mereka menyaksikan(-nya).”

arabic: قَالُوْٓا ءَاَنْتَ فَعَلْتَ هٰذَا بِاٰلِهَتِنَا يٰٓاِبْرٰهِيْمُ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaalooo 'a-anta fa'alta haazaa bi aalihatinaa yaaa Ibraaheem
transliteration_id: Qālū a'anta fa‘alta hāżā bi'ālihatinā yā ibrāhīm(u).
translation_en: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
translation_id: Mereka bertanya, “Apakah engkau yang melakukan (perbuatan) ini terhadap tuhan-tuhan kami, wahai Ibrahim?”

arabic: قَالَ بَلْ فَعَلَهٗ كَبِيْرُهُمْ هٰذَا فَسْـَٔلُوْهُمْ اِنْ كَانُوْا يَنْطِقُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala bal fa'alahoo kabeeruhum haazaa fas'aloohum in kaanoo yantiqoon
transliteration_id: Qāla bal fa‘alahū kabīruhum hāżā fas'alūhum in kānū yanṭiqūn(a).
translation_en: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) menjawab, “Sebenarnya (patung) besar ini yang melakukannya. Tanyakanlah kepada mereka (patung-patung lainnya) jika mereka dapat berbicara.”

arabic: فَرَجَعُوْٓا اِلٰٓى اَنْفُسِهِمْ فَقَالُوْٓا اِنَّكُمْ اَنْتُمُ الظّٰلِمُوْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Faraja'ooo ilaaa anfusihim faqaalooo innakum antumuz zaalimoon
transliteration_id: Fa raja‘ū ilā anfusihim fa qālū innakum antumuẓ-ẓālimūn(a).
translation_en: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
translation_id: Maka, mereka kembali kepada diri mereka sendiri (mulai sadar) lalu berkata (kepada sesama mereka), “Sesungguhnya kamulah yang menzalimi (diri sendiri).”

arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُوْا عَلٰى رُءُوْسِهِمْۚ  لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ يَنْطِقُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Summa nukisoo 'alaa ru'oosihim laqad 'alimta maa haaa'ulaaa'i yantiqoon
transliteration_id: Ṡumma nukisū ‘alā ru'ūsihim, laqad ‘alimta mā hā'ulā'i yanṭiqūn(a).
translation_en: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
translation_id: Kemudian mereka menundukkan kepala (lalu berkata), “Engkau (Ibrahim) pasti tahu bahwa (berhala-berhala) itu tidak dapat berbicara.”

arabic: قَالَ اَفَتَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مَا لَا يَنْفَعُكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَّلَا يَضُرُّكُمْ ۗ
transliteration_en: Qaala afata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'ukum shai'anw wa laa yadurrukum
transliteration_id: Qāla afata‘budūna min dūnillāhi mā lā yanfa‘ukum syai'aw wa lā yaḍurrukum.
translation_en: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
translation_id: Dia (Ibrahim) berkata, “Mengapa kamu menyembah sesuatu selain Allah yang tidak dapat memberi manfaat sedikit pun dan tidak (pula) mendatangkan mudarat kepada kamu?

arabic: اُفٍّ لَّكُمْ وَلِمَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ ۗاَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Uffil lakum wa limaa ta'budoona min doonil laah; afalaa ta'qiloon
transliteration_id: Uffil lakum wa limā ta‘budūna min dūnillāh(i), afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
translation_en: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
translation_id: Celakalah kamu dan apa yang kamu sembah selain Allah! Apakah kamu tidak mengerti?”

arabic: قَالُوْا حَرِّقُوْهُ وَانْصُرُوْٓا اٰلِهَتَكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ فٰعِلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaaloo harriqooho wansurooo aalihatakum in kuntum faa'ileen
transliteration_id: Qālū ḥarriqūhu wanṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fā‘ilīn(a).
translation_en: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Bakarlah dia (Ibrahim) dan bantulah tuhan-tuhan kamu jika kamu benar-benar hendak berbuat.”

arabic: قُلْنَا يٰنَارُ كُوْنِيْ بَرْدًا وَّسَلٰمًا عَلٰٓى اِبْرٰهِيْمَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Qulnaa yaa naaru koonee bardanw wa salaaman 'alaaa Ibraaheem
transliteration_id: Qulnā yā nāru kūnī bardaw wa salāman ‘alā ibrāhīm(a).
translation_en: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
translation_id: Kami (Allah) berfirman, “Wahai api, jadilah dingin dan keselamatan bagi Ibrahim!”

arabic: وَاَرَادُوْا بِهٖ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنٰهُمُ الْاَخْسَرِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa araadoo bihee kaidan faja'alnaahumul akhsareen
transliteration_id: Wa arādū bihī kaidan fa ja‘alnāhumul-akhsarīn(a).
translation_en: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
translation_id: Mereka hendak berbuat jahat terhadap Ibrahim, tetapi Kami menjadikan mereka itu orang-orang yang paling rugi.

arabic: وَنَجَّيْنٰهُ وَلُوْطًا اِلَى الْاَرْضِ الَّتِيْ بٰرَكْناَ فِيْهَا لِلْعٰلَمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa najjainaahu wa Lootan ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa lil 'aalameen
transliteration_id: Wa najjaināhu wa lūṭan ilal-arḍil-latī bāraknā fīhā lil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
translation_id: Kami menyelamatkannya (Ibrahim) dan Lut ke tanah (Syam) yang telah Kami berkahi untuk seluruh alam.

arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهٗٓ اِسْحٰقَ وَيَعْقُوْبَ نَافِلَةً ۗوَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا صٰلِحِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa wahabnaa lahooo Ishaaq; wa Ya'qooba naafilah; wa kullan ja'alnaa saaliheen
transliteration_id: Wa wahabnā lahū isḥāqa wa ya‘qūba nāfilah(tan), wa kullan ja‘alnā  ṣāliḥīn(a).
translation_en: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
translation_id: Kami juga menganugerahkan kepadanya (Ibrahim) Ishaq (anak) dan sebagai tambahan (Kami anugerahkan pula) Ya‘qub (cucu). Masing-masing Kami jadikan orang yang saleh.

arabic: وَجَعَلْنٰهُمْ اَىِٕمَّةً يَّهْدُوْنَ بِاَمْرِنَا وَاَوْحَيْنَآ اِلَيْهِمْ فِعْلَ الْخَيْرٰتِ وَاِقَامَ الصَّلٰوةِ وَاِيْتَاۤءَ الزَّكٰوةِۚ وَكَانُوْا لَنَا عٰبِدِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yahdoona bi amrinaa wa awhainaaa ilaihim fi'lal khairaati wa iqaamas Salaati wa eetaaa'az Zakaati wa kaanoo lanaa 'aabideen
transliteration_id: Wa ja‘alnāhum a'immatay yahdūna bi'amrinā wa auḥainā ilaihim fi‘lal-khairāti wa iqāmaṣ-ṣalāti wa ītā'az-zakāh(ti), wa kānū lanā ‘ābidīn(a).
translation_en: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
translation_id: Kami menjadikan mereka itu pemimpin-pemimpin yang memberi petunjuk atas perintah Kami dan Kami mewahyukan kepada mereka (perintah) berbuat kebaikan, menegakkan salat, dan menunaikan zakat, serta hanya kepada Kami mereka menyembah.

arabic: وَلُوْطًا اٰتَيْنٰهُ حُكْمًا وَّعِلْمًا وَّنَجَّيْنٰهُ مِنَ الْقَرْيَةِ الَّتِيْ كَانَتْ تَّعْمَلُ الْخَبٰۤىِٕثَ ۗاِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فٰسِقِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw wa 'ilmanw wa najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen
transliteration_id: Wa lūṭan ātaināhu ḥumkaw wa ‘ilmaw wa najjaināhu minal-qaryatil-latī kānat ta‘malul-khabā'iṡ(a), innahum kānū qauma sau'in fāsiqīn(a).
translation_en: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
translation_id: Kepada Lut, Kami menganugerahkan hikmah serta ilmu dan Kami menyelamatkannya dari (azab yang telah menimpa penduduk) negeri (Sodom) yang melakukan perbuatan keji. Sesungguhnya mereka adalah kaum yang jahat lagi fasik.

arabic: وَاَدْخَلْنٰهُ فِيْ رَحْمَتِنَاۗ اِنَّهٗ مِنَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saalihee
transliteration_id: Wa adkhalnāhu fī raḥmatinā,  innahū minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
translation_en: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
translation_id: Kami memasukkannya ke dalam rahmat Kami. Sesungguhnya dia termasuk golongan orang-orang yang saleh.

arabic: وَنُوْحًا اِذْ نَادٰى مِنْ قَبْلُ فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗ فَنَجَّيْنٰهُ وَاَهْلَهٗ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيْمِ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa noohan iz naadaa min qablu fastajabnaa lahoo fanajjainaahu wa ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem
transliteration_id: Wa nūḥan iż nādā min qablu fastajabnā lahū fa najjaināhu wa ahlahū minal-karbil-‘aẓīm(i).
translation_en: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
translation_id: (Ingatlah) Nuh ketika dia berdoa sebelum itu. Kami memperkenankan (doa)-nya dan Kami menyelamatkannya bersama pengikutnya dari bencana yang besar.

arabic: وَنَصَرْنٰهُ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الَّذِيْنَ كَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَاۗ اِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فَاَغْرَقْنٰهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa; innahum kkaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq naahum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Wa naṣarnāhu minal-qaumil-lażīna każżabū bi'āyātinā, innahum kānū qauma sau'in fa agraqnāhum ajma‘īn(a).
translation_en: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
translation_id: Kami menolongnya dari orang-orang yang telah mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami. Sesungguhnya mereka adalah kaum yang jahat, maka Kami tenggelamkan mereka semuanya.

arabic: وَدَاوٗدَ وَسُلَيْمٰنَ اِذْ يَحْكُمٰنِ فِى الْحَرْثِ اِذْ نَفَشَتْ فِيْهِ غَنَمُ الْقَوْمِۚ وَكُنَّا لِحُكْمِهِمْ شٰهِدِيْنَ ۖ
transliteration_en: Wa Daawooda wa Sulaimaana iz yahkumaani fil harsi iz nafashat feehi ghanamul qawmi wa kunnaa lihukmihim shaahideen
transliteration_id: Wa dāwūda wa sulaimāna iż yaḥkumāni fil-ḥarṡi iż nafasyat fīhi ganamul-qaum(i), wa kunnā liḥukmihim syāhidīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
translation_id: (Ingatlah) Daud dan Sulaiman ketika mereka memberikan keputusan mengenai ladang yang dirusak pada malam hari oleh kambing-kambing milik kaumnya. Kami menyaksikan keputusan (yang diberikan) oleh mereka itu.

arabic: فَفَهَّمْنٰهَا سُلَيْمٰنَۚ وَكُلًّا اٰتَيْنَا حُكْمًا وَّعِلْمًاۖ وَّسَخَّرْنَا مَعَ دَاوٗدَ الْجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحْنَ وَالطَّيْرَۗ وَكُنَّا فٰعِلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fafahhamnaahaa sulaimaan; wa kullan aatainaa hukmanw wa'ilmanw wa sakh kharnaa ma'a Daawoodal jibaala yusabbihna wattayr; wa kunnaa faa'ileen
transliteration_id: Fa fahhamnāhā sulaimān(a), wa kullan ātainā ḥukmaw wa ‘ilmā(n), wa sakhkharnā ma‘a dāwūdal-jibāla yusabbiḥna waṭ-ṭair(a), wa kunnā fā‘ilīn(a).
translation_en: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
translation_id: Lalu, Kami memberi pemahaman kepada Sulaiman (tentang keputusan yang lebih tepat). Kepada masing-masing (Daud dan Sulaiman) Kami memberi hikmah dan ilmu. Kami menundukkan gunung-gunung dan burung-burung untuk bertasbih bersama Daud. Kamilah yang melakukannya.

arabic: وَعَلَّمْنٰهُ صَنْعَةَ لَبُوْسٍ لَّكُمْ لِتُحْصِنَكُمْ مِّنْۢ بَأْسِكُمْۚ فَهَلْ اَنْتُمْ شٰكِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa 'allamanaahu san'ata laboosil lakum lituhsinakum mim baasikum fahal antum shaakiroon
transliteration_id: Wa ‘allamnāhu ṣan‘ata labūsil lakum lituḥṣinakum mim ba'sikum, fahal antum syākirūn(a).
translation_en: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
translation_id: Kami mengajarkan pula kepada Daud cara membuat baju besi untukmu guna melindungimu dari serangan musuhmu (dalam peperangan). Maka, apakah kamu bersyukur (kepada Allah)?

arabic: وَلِسُلَيْمٰنَ الرِّيْحَ عَاصِفَةً تَجْرِيْ بِاَمْرِهٖٓ اِلَى الْاَرْضِ الَّتِيْ بٰرَكْنَا فِيْهَاۗ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa li Sulaimaanar reeha 'aasifatan tajree bi amriheee ilal ardil latee baaraknaa feehaa; wa kunnaa bikulli shai'in 'aalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa lisulaimānar-rīḥa ‘āṣifatan tajrī bi'amrihī ilal-arḍil-latī bāraknā fīhā, wa kunnā bikulli syai'in ‘ālimīn(a).
translation_en: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
translation_id: (Kami menundukkan) pula untuk Sulaiman angin yang sangat kencang tiupannya yang berembus dengan perintahnya ke negeri yang Kami beri berkah padanya. Kami Maha Mengetahui segala sesuatu.

arabic: وَمِنَ الشَّيٰطِيْنِ مَنْ يَّغُوْصُوْنَ لَهٗ وَيَعْمَلُوْنَ عَمَلًا دُوْنَ ذٰلِكَۚ وَكُنَّا لَهُمْ حٰفِظِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Wa minash Shayaateeni mai yaghoosoona lahoo wa ya'maloona 'amalan doona zaalika wa kunna lahum baafizeen
transliteration_id: Wa minasy-syayāṭīna may yagūṣūna lahū wa ya‘malūna ‘amalan dūna żālik(a), wa kunnā lahum ḥāfiẓīn(a).
translation_en: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
translation_id: (Kami tundukkan pula kepada Sulaiman) segolongan setan yang menyelam (ke dalam laut) untuknya dan mengerjakan pekerjaan selain itu. Kamilah yang memelihara mereka itu.

arabic: ۞ وَاَيُّوْبَ اِذْ نَادٰى رَبَّهٗٓ اَنِّيْ مَسَّنِيَ الضُّرُّ وَاَنْتَ اَرْحَمُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa Ayyooba iz naadaa Rabbahooo annee massaniyad durru wa Anta arhamur raahimeen
transliteration_id: Wa ayyūba iż nādā rabbahū annī massaniyaḍ-ḍurru wa anta arḥamur-rāḥimīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
translation_id: (Ingatlah) Ayyub ketika dia berdoa kepada Tuhannya, “(Ya Tuhanku,) sesungguhnya aku telah ditimpa penyakit, padahal Engkau Tuhan Yang Maha Penyayang dari semua yang penyayang.”

arabic: فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗ فَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهٖ مِنْ ضُرٍّ وَّاٰتَيْنٰهُ اَهْلَهٗ وَمِثْلَهُمْ مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِنْدِنَا وَذِكْرٰى لِلْعٰبِدِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf naa maa bihee min durrinw wa aatainaahu ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam min 'indinaa wa zikraa lil'aabideen
transliteration_id: Fastajabnā lahū fa kasyafnā mā bihī min ḍurriw wa ātaināhu ahlahū wa miṡlahum ma‘ahum raḥmatam min ‘indinā wa żikrā lil-‘ābidīn(a).
translation_en: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
translation_id: Maka, Kami mengabulkan (doa)-nya, lalu Kami lenyapkan penyakit yang ada padanya, Kami mengembalikan keluarganya kepadanya, dan (Kami melipatgandakan jumlah mereka) sebagai suatu rahmat dari Kami dan pengingat bagi semua yang menyembah (Kami).

arabic: وَاِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَاِدْرِيْسَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِۗ  كُلٌّ مِّنَ الصّٰبِرِيْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Wa Ismaa'eela wa Idreesa wa Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen
transliteration_id: Wa ismā‘īla wa idrīsa wa żal-kifl(i), kullum minaṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
translation_id: (Ingatlah pula) Ismail, Idris, dan Zulkifli. Mereka semua termasuk orang-orang sabar.

arabic: وَاَدْخَلْنٰهُمْ فِيْ رَحْمَتِنَاۗ اِنَّهُمْ مِّنَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen
transliteration_id: Wa adkhalnāhum fī raḥmatinā, innahum minaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
translation_en: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
translation_id: Kami memasukkan mereka ke dalam rahmat Kami. Sesungguhnya mereka termasuk orang-orang saleh.

arabic: وَذَا النُّوْنِ اِذْ ذَّهَبَ مُغَاضِبًا فَظَنَّ اَنْ لَّنْ نَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَنَادٰى فِى الظُّلُمٰتِ اَنْ لَّآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّآ اَنْتَ سُبْحٰنَكَ اِنِّيْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa Zan Nooni iz zahaba mughaadiban fazaanna al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaanna al lan naqdira 'alaihi fanaadaa fiz zulumaati al laaa ilaaha illaaa Anta Subhaanaka innee kuntu minaz zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa żan-nūni iż żahaba mugāḍiban fa ẓanna allan naqdira ‘alaihi fa nādā fiẓ-ẓulumāti allā ilāha illā anta subḥānaka innī kuntu minaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
translation_id: (Ingatlah pula) Zun Nun (Yunus) ketika dia pergi dalam keadaan marah, lalu dia menyangka bahwa Kami tidak akan menyulitkannya. Maka, dia berdoa dalam kegelapan yang berlapis-lapis, “Tidak ada tuhan selain Engkau. Maha Suci Engkau. Sesungguhnya aku termasuk orang-orang zalim.”

arabic: فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗۙ وَنَجَّيْنٰهُ مِنَ الْغَمِّۗ وَكَذٰلِكَ نُـْۨجِى الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa najjainaahu minal ghamm; wa kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen
transliteration_id: Fastajabnā lahū wa najjaināhu minal-gamm(i), wa każālika nunjil-mu'minīn(a).
translation_en: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
translation_id: Kami lalu mengabulkan (doa)-nya dan Kami menyelamatkannya dari kedukaan. Demikianlah Kami menyelamatkan orang-orang mukmin.

arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ اِذْ نَادٰى رَبَّهٗ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِيْ فَرْدًا وَّاَنْتَ خَيْرُ الْوٰرِثِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wa Zakariyyaaa iz naadaa Rabbahoo Rabbi laa tazarnee fardanw wa Anta khairul waariseen
transliteration_id: Wa zakariyyā iż nādā rabbahū rabbi lā tażarnī fardaw wa anta khairul-wāriṡīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
translation_id: (Ingatlah) Zakaria ketika dia berdoa kepada Tuhannya, “Ya Tuhanku, janganlah Engkau biarkan aku hidup seorang diri (tanpa keturunan), sedang Engkau adalah sebaik-baik waris.

arabic: فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗ  ۖوَوَهَبْنَا لَهٗ يَحْيٰى وَاَصْلَحْنَا لَهٗ زَوْجَهٗۗ اِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا يُسٰرِعُوْنَ فِى الْخَيْرٰتِ وَيَدْعُوْنَنَا رَغَبًا وَّرَهَبًاۗ وَكَانُوْا لَنَا خٰشِعِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fastajabnaa lahoo wa wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa yad'oonanaa raghabanw wa rahabaa; wa kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een
transliteration_id: Fastajabnā lah(ū), wa wahabnā lahū yaḥyā wa aṣlaḥnā lahū zaujah(ū), innahum kānū yusāri‘ūna fil-khairāti wa yad‘ūnanā ragabaw wa rahabā(n), wa kānū lanā khāsyi‘īn(a).
translation_en: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
translation_id: Maka, Kami mengabulkan (doa)-nya, menganugerahkan Yahya kepadanya, dan menjadikan istrinya (dapat mengandung). Sesungguhnya mereka selalu bersegera dalam (mengerjakan) kebaikan dan berdoa kepada Kami dengan penuh harap dan cemas. Mereka adalah orang-orang yang khusyuk kepada Kami.

arabic: وَالَّتِيْٓ اَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيْهَا مِنْ رُّوْحِنَا وَجَعَلْنٰهَا وَابْنَهَآ اٰيَةً لِّلْعٰلَمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa mir roohinaa wa ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen
transliteration_id: Wal-latī aḥṣanat farjahā fa nafakhnā fīhā mir rūḥinā wa ja‘alnāhā wabnahā āyatal lil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
translation_id: (Ingatlah pula Maryam) yang memelihara kehormatannya, lalu Kami meniupkan (roh) dari Kami ke dalam (tubuh)-nya. Kami menjadikan dia dan anaknya sebagai tanda (kebesaran Kami) bagi seluruh alam.

arabic: اِنَّ هٰذِهٖٓ اُمَّتُكُمْ اُمَّةً وَّاحِدَةًۖ وَّاَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَاعْبُدُوْنِ
transliteration_en: Inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon
transliteration_id: Inna hāżihī ummatukum ummataw wāḥidah(tan), wa ana rabbukum fa‘budūn(i).
translation_en: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya ini (agama tauhid) adalah agamamu, agama yang satu, dan Aku adalah Tuhanmu. Maka, sembahlah Aku.

arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوْٓا اَمْرَهُمْ بَيْنَهُمْۗ كُلٌّ اِلَيْنَا رٰجِعُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa taqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum kullun ilainaaa raaji'oon
transliteration_id: Wa taqaṭṭa‘ū amrahum bainahum, kullun ilainā rāji‘ūn(a).
translation_en: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
translation_id: Akan tetapi, mereka terpecah-belah dalam urusan (agama) di antara mereka. Masing-masing (golongan itu) akan kembali kepada Kami.

arabic: فَمَنْ يَّعْمَلْ مِنَ الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا كُفْرَانَ لِسَعْيِهٖۚ وَاِنَّا لَهٗ كٰتِبُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Famai ya'mal minas saalihaati wa huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee wa innaa lahoo kaatiboon
transliteration_id: Famay ya‘mal minaṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa huwa mu'minun falā kufrāna lisa‘yih(ī), wa innā lahū kātibūn(a).
translation_en: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
translation_id: Siapa yang mengerjakan kebajikan dan dia beriman, maka usahanya tidak akan diingkari (disia-siakan). Sesungguhnya Kamilah yang mencatat untuknya.

arabic: وَحَرٰمٌ عَلٰى قَرْيَةٍ اَهْلَكْنٰهَآ اَنَّهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa haraamun 'alaa qaryatin ahlaknaahaaa annahum laa yarji'oon
transliteration_id: Wa ḥarāmun ‘alā qaryatin ahlaknāhā, innahum lā yarji‘ūn(a).
translation_en: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
translation_id: Mustahil bagi (penduduk) suatu negeri yang telah Kami binasakan akan kembali (ke dunia),

arabic: حَتّٰىٓ اِذَا فُتِحَتْ يَأْجُوْجُ وَمَأْجُوْجُ وَهُمْ مِّنْ كُلِّ حَدَبٍ يَّنْسِلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Hattaaa izaa futihat Yaajooju wa Maajooju wa hum min kulli hadabiny yansiloon
transliteration_id: Ḥattā iżā futiḥat ya'jūju wa ma'jūju wa hum min kulli ḥadabiy yansilūn(a).
translation_en: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
translation_id: hingga apabila (tembok) Ya’juj dan Ma’juj dibuka dan mereka turun dengan cepat dari seluruh tempat yang tinggi.

arabic: وَاقْتَرَبَ الْوَعْدُ الْحَقُّ فَاِذَا هِيَ شَاخِصَةٌ اَبْصَارُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْاۗ يٰوَيْلَنَا قَدْ كُنَّا فِيْ غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هٰذَا بَلْ كُنَّا ظٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatim min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Waqtarabal-wa‘dul-ḥaqqu fa iżā hiya syākhiṣatun abṣārul-lażīna kafarū, yā wailanā qad kunnā fī gaflatim min hāżā bal kunnā ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
translation_id: (Apabila) janji yang benar (yakni hari Kiamat) telah makin dekat, tiba-tiba mata orang-orang yang kufur terbelalak. (Mereka berkata,) “Alangkah celakanya kami! Kami benar-benar lengah tentang ini, bahkan kami adalah orang-orang zalim.”

arabic: اِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَۗ اَنْتُمْ لَهَا وٰرِدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Innakum wa maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon
transliteration_id: Innakum wa mā ta‘budūna min dūnillāhi ḥaṣabu jahannam(a), antum lahā wāridūn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya kamu (orang kafir) dan apa yang kamu sembah selain Allah adalah bahan bakar (neraka) Jahanam. Kamu (pasti) masuk ke dalamnya.

arabic: لَوْ كَانَ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ اٰلِهَةً مَّا وَرَدُوْهَاۗ وَكُلٌّ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatam maa waradoohaa wa kullun feehaa khaalidoon
transliteration_id: Lau kāna hā'ulā'i ālihatam mā waradūhā, wa kullun fīhā khālidūn(a).
translation_en: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
translation_id: Seandainya (berhala-berhala) itu tuhan, tentu mereka tidak akan memasukinya (neraka). Semuanya akan kekal di dalamnya.

arabic: لَهُمْ فِيْهَا زَفِيْرٌ وَّهُمْ فِيْهَا لَا يَسْمَعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw wa hum feehaa laa yasma'oon
transliteration_id: Lahum fīhā zafīruw wa hum fīhā lā yasma‘ūn(a).
translation_en: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
translation_id: Mereka merintih dan menjerit di dalamnya (neraka) dan mereka di dalamnya tidak dapat mendengar (apa pun).
